sendingDomainsDesc: Add and verify a sending domain to improve your email deliverability and sender reputation. A verified domain tells email providers that MegaMail has permission to send emails on your behalf.
domainAddedSuccess: Domain {{domain}} added successfully. Follow the instructions to verify it.
confirmDeleteDomain: Are you sure you want to delete the domain {{domainName}}?
noDomainsFoundDesc: Add and verify a sending domain to improve your email deliverability and sender reputation.
defaultSenderDescription: Set a default 'From' email address to be used with this specific domain. This can help pre-fill sender information in your campaigns.
recordInstructionSPF: Add this TXT record to your domain's DNS settings to specify that MegaMail is a permitted sender.
recordInstructionDKIM: Add this TXT record to enable DKIM authentication, which helps prevent email spoofing.
recordInstructionTracking: Add this CNAME record to enable click and open tracking with your own domain.
recordInstructionDMARC: Add this TXT record to set up DMARC, which tells receiving servers what to do with unauthenticated emails.
updateDefaultSenderDesc: Enter an email address from one of your verified domains to set it as the account-wide default sender.
addSenderDesc: Add a new sender email address. A verification email will be sent to confirm ownership.
confirmDeleteSender: Are you sure you want to delete the sender {{email}}?
senderAddedSuccess: Verification email sent to {{email}}. Please check the inbox to complete verification.
noSendersDesc: Add sender email addresses that you can use in the 'From' field of your campaigns.
